game.name: Tropico 4: Megalopolis DLC
game.shortDescription: Build the largest city in the Caribbean on an island with constant influx of immigrants. Deal with problems such as unemployment, over-population and food shortages. Use the Conventillo, a cheap residential building that houses many residents using little space.
